page.title: 20Weekend and leisure time
page.content: During fine weather, most children play outside or go to the beach and swimming pools. Indoor activities include{watching television, reading {and playing on computers.}There are many clubs and activities which they can join. These include{Brownies, {Cubs, dancing classes, horse riding, {gymnastics, trampolining, and judo. The following are excerpts fom three children's diaries: On Saturday, I went to{dancing class then I played schools with my sister. In the afternoon I went to{Brownie {Revels. On Sunday it was the{country fair}at Robin Hill. We watched the lumberjacks , wool spinning and lace making. I went to my grandma's house and got ready for a{barbecue.}There was a {fancy dress competition}and I dressed as a clown.
